pretext: 2222, overpopulation of the earth, famine, lack of resources. All this prompted humanity to start exploring the planets of the solar system. At the same time, information was received from satellites about the capture of Pluto by aliens. So our expansion collided with someone else's expansion. Therefore, we decided to entrust you, as a former military man, to lead this difficult task. The fate of humanity is in your hands!
what_data: How does your data make the game better?
part1: Let us better understand what to do next for the game so that everyone can get the best experience
part2: Detects when a specific user encounters problems in our game and allows us to quickly solve their problems
